description: Try our easy to follow Bread Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Bread Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 slices ciabatta, toasted and cut into chunky bite-sized cubes
1 jar roasted capsicums, drained and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Put the bread cubes in a large bowl, and drizzle over the olive oil. Add the basil, and season with salt and black pepper. Toss together, and leave to stand for about 10 minutes, to allow the flavours to develop.
Add the capsicums, tomatoes, pine nuts, and cheese, and toss gently until everything is evenly mixed. Serve with cold cooked meats.
